<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_ux_metrics_app</collection> <condition>!gs.isPaused()</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Register UX Metrics Application</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var applicationStatus = new UXMetricsApplications().registerApp({ tableName: current.getTableName(), sysId: current.sys_id, channel: current.channel, appType: current.app_type });
if (applicationStatus && applicationStatus.error) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Unable to register application, {0}", applicationStatus.error)); } else if (sn_app_analytics.SNAnalytics.isApplicationRegistered(current.getTableName(), current.sys_id)) { gs.addInfoMessage("Application successfully registered with appsee"); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-04 05:41:14</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1886b0e8732011107d804c9885f6a7dd</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Register UX Metrics Application</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="UX Metrics" source="com.glide.ux.metrics">06e638e43cb1311068bcf327dfe37fe5</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1886b0e8732011107d804c9885f6a7dd</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-10-10 23:01:56</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1886b0e8732011107d804c9885f6a7dd"/> </record_update>
